package.name: Optimiseweb_Redirects
package.summary: Broken links can affect traffic and conversions. The Optimise Web Redirects extension helps setup bulk 301 redirects.
package.description:
Magento has an internal URL Rewrite Management system. It can be a laborious task to add all your redirects, one by one.
The Optimise Web Redirects extension allows you to upload all your redirect data as a CSV file.
package.notes: Renamed the blocks, helpers and models to ow_redirects. The previously used name was causing problems with compilation. If you encounter any issues with this version please write to us and we will sort it out quickly.
